section.title: Using VNC Console
section.para: There are several methods to interact with the VNC console, using a VNC client directly, a special java client, or through the web browser. For information about configuring the console, see .

section.title: Get an access URL
section.para: Nova enables you to create access_urls through the os-consoles extension. Support for accessing this URL is provided by the nova client:
Specify 'novnc' to get a URL suitable for pasting into a web browser.
Specify 'xvpvnc' for a URL suitable for pasting into the Java client.
